submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        x, y = 1, 1
        i, j = 0, 0
        ans = 0
        while i < m-1 and j < n-1:
            u = horizontalCut[i]
            v = verticalCut[j]
            ux = u*x
            vy = v*y
            if u > v:
                ans += ux
                y += 1
                i += 1
            else:
                ans += vy
                x += 1
                j += 1
        while i < m-1:
            u = horizontalCut[i]
            ux = u*x
            ans += ux
            i += 1
        while j < n-1:
            v = verticalCut[j]
            vy = v*y
            ans += vy
            j += 1
        return ans
